# Welcome

Hi, I'm Trevor Gratz, a data scientist with experience in predictive analytics, causal inference, and stakeholder-driven product development. I specialize in building data-driven solutions that guide decision-making and enhance operational efficiency.

---

## About Me {#about-me}

I have a background in mathematics, statistics, and data science, and I've worked in academia and the public sector. I received my Bachelor of Science in Mathematics and Statistics in 2014 from the University of Washington, and my Master of Science in Data Analytics from Georgia Tech in August, 2025. I have over a decade of work experience in data analytics and am a co-author on over ten peer reviewed [publications](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=X7r0bxsAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao) cited by over 500 journal articles.
